attributes.action: Immediately abolish mixed sex wards in hospitals.  It is disgraceful that in the 21st century the British public cannot have same sex wards.  If for no other reason than the dignity of the patients.  But also for the health of the patients.  It is disgusting that wards are filled on the REQUIREMENTS of the doctors and surgeons.  If you are as outraged as me then sign this.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If its not bad enough with all the hospital bugs, we have to endure mixed sex wards.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Mixed-Wards/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
